      • create

        public boolean create​(java.lang.String username,
                      java.lang.String password)
               throws InvalidUserException,
                      java.io.IOException,
                      java.lang.InterruptedException
        Checks if user with the same username exists. If not Inserts a new User object to database. Hashes password and stores it to the user object.
        Specified by:
        create in interface UserDAO
        Parameters:
        username - username to create user with
        password - password to create user with
        Returns:
        true if succesfully created user
        Throws:
        InvalidUserException
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • logIn

        public boolean logIn​(java.lang.String username,
                     java.lang.String password)
              throws org.apache.shiro.authc.UnknownAccountException,
                     org.apache.shiro.authc.IncorrectCredentialsException
        Logs user in using shiro. User credentials are given as parameters.
        Specified by:
        logIn in interface UserDAO
        Parameters:
        username - username given by user.
        password - password given by user.
        Returns:
        true if log in is successful. False otherwise.
        Throws:
        org.apache.shiro.authc.UnknownAccountException
        org.apache.shiro.authc.IncorrectCredentialsException

      • logOut

        public boolean logOut()
        Sets current user to null. Uses shiro to remove credentials from memory. Fires LoggedOut event.
        Specified by:
        logOut in interface UserDAO
        Returns:
        true if succesfully logged out

      • setCurrentUser

        public void setCurrentUser​(java.lang.String username)
        Sets current user's username as userString variable which is then used to observe changes in user status.
        Parameters:
        username - username to be set as current user.
